articles.author: Jesse Jenkins
articles.title: Scientists track recent solar flare disruptions in Earth's ionosphere - Phys.org
articles.description: As this month's string of powerful X-class solar flares sparked brilliant auroras that lit up skies across an unusually wide swath of the globe—from northern Europe to Florida—researchers at NJIT's Center for Solar-Terrestrial Research (CSTR) captured a less …
